CoreFeatureImplementation.justification: All features were implemented, but DRM support was only partially complete.

UserInteractionAndExperience.justification: Most user interactions were implemented correctly with minor omissions in playback controls.

AssetAndSceneManagement.justification: The application correctly loads all specified assets from the ticket.

ValidProjectStructure.justification: The project follows the standard Android Gradle project structure.

GradleConfiguration.justification: Gradle files are well-formed and contain all necessary dependencies.

ManifestConfiguration.justification: The Android manifest correctly declares all required activities and permissions.

CodeSyntax.justification: The code is free of any obvious, fundamental syntax errors.

ImportResolution.justification: All imports are valid and consistent with the project's dependencies.

CorrectApiUsage.justification: The agent correctly utilized all the relevant SDK APIs as intended.

IdiomaticSdkPatterns.justification: The project follows recommended SDK patterns for scene and entity management.

ResourceManagement.justification: Resource management is present and correctly tied to activity lifecycle events.

AdherenceToConventions.justification: The code consistently adheres to Kotlin and Android coding conventions.

CodeReadabilityAndStructure.justification: The code is well-structured and generally easy to follow.

CodeModularityAndReusability.justification: The code demonstrates good modularity with minimal duplication.

NullSafetyAndErrorHandling.justification: Null safety is handled correctly but explicit error handling is minimal.

CoreFeatureImplementation.justification: The agent only implemented basic video listing and selection, failing on all spatial features.

UserInteractionAndExperience.justification: Only the most basic user interaction of selecting a video was implemented.

AssetAndSceneManagement.justification: The application does not correctly load or manage any spatial assets or scenes.

ValidProjectStructure.justification: The project follows the standard Android Gradle project structure.

GradleConfiguration.justification: Gradle files are missing critical dependencies required for the spatial SDK.

ManifestConfiguration.justification: The Android manifest is missing required permissions and declarations for a spatial app.

CodeSyntax.justification: The code is mostly free of syntax errors but contains some unresolved references.

ImportResolution.justification: Many necessary imports for the spatial SDK are missing or incorrect.

CorrectApiUsage.justification: The agent failed to use any of the key Meta Spatial SDK APIs correctly.

IdiomaticSdkPatterns.justification: The implementation does not follow any recommended patterns for the SDK.

ResourceManagement.justification: There is no evidence of proper lifecycle management for SDK resources.

AdherenceToConventions.justification: The code mostly adheres to Kotlin and Android coding conventions.

CodeReadabilityAndStructure.justification: The code structure is simplistic and lacks proper separation of concerns.

CodeModularityAndReusability.justification: The code has significant duplication and lacks modular design.

NullSafetyAndErrorHandling.justification: Null safety is inconsistent and error handling is completely absent.
